summary: An exhilarating documentary film that celebrates the unsung hero of aviation - the local airport - by tracing the life, history, and struggles of an airport icon: Southern California's Van Nuys Airport.
cast: Hal Fishman|Lily Gagnier|Lucas Gragnier|Desiree Horton|Clay Lacy|Lorenzo Lamas|Kevin LaRosa Jr.|Cody Masden|Paul Moyer|Bob Philpott|Sydney Pollack|Danny Shalev|Edan Shalev|Stacy Sheard|Morgan Woodward
director: Director: Brian J. Terwilliger (as Brian Terwilliger)
title: One Six Right
